channel.title: Making Shortcut for Something Donwloaded in WinAce
channel.description: How do I access something that I have downloaded in WinAce, or make a shortcut for something I've got open. Because I have just downloaded PSCS3 Portable from rapidshare, and it opened with WinAce. I closed WinAce, but kept Photoshop open, but now I realised if I turn off the computer, I won't know how to get back to Photoshop. Please help, Coke.

item.title: Making Shortcut for Something Donwloaded in WinAce
item.dc:creator: @I_Coke_I I Coke I
item.description:
@I_Coke_I wrote:

How do I access something that I have downloaded in WinAce, or make a shortcut for something I’ve got open. Because I have just downloaded PSCS3 Portable from rapidshare, and it opened with WinAce. I closed WinAce, but kept Photoshop open, but now I realised if I turn off the computer, I won’t know how to get back to Photoshop. Please help,
Coke.

Read full topic
